评论概述: Fits great, Feels comfortable, only had it for a day
评论详情: I have been searching for a comfortable pair of pants for a long time. I have purchased other brands with different material and sizes, but nothing have worked well. I thought I give this brand and pair a try. I am an average guy, that is I am slight overweight. I have a waist that 37". I am only 5'6" tall. I weight 166 lbs. I noticed that most male models on Amazon clothing webpage are incredibly fit and muscular like NFL pros. They are 6'2" tall, 170 lbs, 32" waist. So their shirts, pants, ... do not fit me. I have only wore this pants for 1 hour and I will continue to wear it, so I can give a fair review. Right not I have to say it is comfortable and fits my belly, big ass, and thick thighs. The fabric is soft and flexible. It is good for warm and hot weather. I do not know if it will work for cold, wintry weather. But you can always add thermal underpants if you live in the Northern states (Wisconsin, Illinois, New York). I live in the San Francisco Bay Area (California). Our weather is unusually mild & moderate. Never too hot, never too cold. I cannot say if this pants are durable. That will take time to determine. That is why I took one star off for 4 stars. I used a measuring tape to determine my waist, hips, and inseam length. Amazon's webpage for Libin pants suggested size "Large." But my measurements matched "X-Large." Amazon delivered size Large. Size Large fits me perfectly.

I absolutely love these golf pants and I bought two pairs. Use them to go golfing in Canada last month and they were perfect. I would recommend that you go one size down. I usually wear a large and had to get a medium. That way they don’t sag in the crotch area.
I would like them better if they had a shorter inseam choices. I’m 5’10” and these r 1”-1.5” too long.
Nice waist band and comfortable feel
Bought my 4th pay of these joggers. Comfortable and stylish and can be worn either home or on an outing. Highly recommended.

These fit true to size. The material is mid-weight and very stretchy. Elastic waist is substantial, but smooth and comfortable. On sale these were a good value.

评论详情: Pants are a nightmare for me, I'm 6'4", 260lbs and have thick hips, thighs and reasonably sized calves. I love pants with a ton of stretch, pants that have a good taper to them that don't make my legs look massive and pants that have a fly and waist button. I had been looking for a long time to find pants that are casual enough without being bona fide athletic wear but feel like it. These pants fit the bill exactly. I bought the olive green pair and love them and will definitely be buying more. The material is superb feeling, the stretch is just like athletic pants, the zipper and button waist work exactly how they should and the taper is spot on! Love these pants, they totally made my day when I got them.

To say the least, these are now "I don't leave the house wearing these" pants. They're too thin for winter wear so in our opinion, they aren't worth it unless you don't sweat.
